name: health-prediction-system
description: Cancer risk prediction system with ML integration

scripts.start-frontend: cd frontend && cross-env PORT=3001 npm start
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
